WORK_TOGETHER.INTRO: Hi, I'm a Frontend Developer based near Erfurt. I'm driven by the endless possibilities in IT, and I'm passionate about creating visually stunning and user-friendly websites and applications. My ability to solve complex problems and my passion for programming make me a valuable member of your team.
WORK_TOGETHER.CONTACT_MESSAGE: If you think I’d be a good match for your projects, contact me!

WORK.TITLE: My Work
WORK.SUBTITLE: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

DESCRIPTION.JOIN: Task Manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
DESCRIPTION.POLLO_LOCO: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
DESCRIPTION.POKEDEX: Based on a PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokemon information.
